titleStmt.title: New quæres of conscience, touching the late oath; desiring resolution.

notesStmt.note: The words "1. The threefold .. Protestant religion." in title are enclosed in a complex system of brackets.
The imprint, from colophon, is false; actual place of publication from Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
With: Examinations, or, A discovery of some dangerous positions delivered in a sermon of reformation preached in the Church of the Savoy last fast day, Iuly 26. by Tho. Fuller B.D. and since printed.
